string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Yes, there is a friend of mine who needs your help. Go see him.
Good luck stalker.
Covert Agent
Retrieve documents left by a Clear Sky operative and return them to Lebdev.
One of my operatives has left some documents for me at an unmarked drop point. I want you to retrieve them for me. Don't let anyone follow you. If you see someone tailing you, kill them immediately.
You weren't followed here were you? Good work.
Protect Clear Sky Base
Remove any hostile forces in the area to prevent them from discovering Clear Sky base.
There has been an increase of activity in the swamp. I can't risk having anyone blunder into our base. I want you to clear the area of anyone hostile to Clear Sky.
You have done well. Thank you stalker.
Find a "%s" artefact for Cold
Cold needs the %s artefact.
Stalker, I need you to bring me an artefact.
Find me a "%s" artefact. I must procure one for study. I believe there are properties to it that are yet undiscovered.
Ah, wonderful, you found one. You have done well.
Search Agroprom Underground
Stolen Military documents are stashed in the tunnels below Agroprom. Find them and return them to Cold.

One of our agents has managed to capture important document from the Military but he was killed before he could bring them back. They are currently hidden in the tunnels below Agroprom. I need you to covertly infiltrate the area and find them before the Military does. Return them here at once when you have found them. Good luck to you.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Blood Red Sky
Kick the Renegades out of the Swamps.

So you made it. Good, we are in deep trouble. The Renegades are lurking again in the Swamps. I guess we are not the only ones who made it back after all these damn years. A group of our brave guards will join your company, we must fight them back. Good luck, stalker.
Ah, what a relief! You are a brave stalker. You have my thanks.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I know of someone who could use your services. Go see him, he is known to pay well.
Good luck stalker.
Clear Out Mutant Lair for Librarian
Librarian knows of a mutant lair in the area he would like cleared out.
There's a mutant lair not too far from here. Go poke it with a stick.
Heh, nice job. Here's something for your trouble.
Procure %s for Clear Sky
Librarian has asked me to bring him %s.
I could use your help. Provisions are running low and it's not easy getting resupplied down here.
We need %s.
Great man, thanks.
Initiation into Clear Sky
Cold will welcome you into Clear Sky for 15,000 RU.

Yes, we've been watching you...just the right amount of curious and adventurous. You will be a good fit for Clear Sky. However, we insist every initiate pays a 15,000 RU fee. This helps fund our research and pay our protection. What do you say?
Good. There's lots of research to be done. Go see where you can help out.
Great Swamp Clean-up
Cold wants to root out Clear Sky's enemies from the Great Swamp. Collect %s.

At first we were almost grateful that the military barged in on our bandit clean-up. Sadly, later they set up a few permanent outposts to the north. Their patrols aren't exactly friendly to our guys either, not to mention they did a shoddy job and there's a constant trickle of bandits harassing our outposts. Show them what we're made of.

At first we were almost grateful that the military barged in on our bandit clean-up. Sadly, later they set up a few permanent outposts to the north. Their patrols aren't exactly friendly to our guys either, not to mention they did a shoddy job and there's a constant trickle of bandits harassing our outposts. Show them what we're made of. Bring me some %ses as proof of a job well-done.
Here you are, our professional hitman. I suppose those bastards will think twice before they dare visit our Swamp again. I hope. Here's your reward, by the way.
Night Terror
Cold wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which roams not far away from the Hidden Base.

Mutants rarely stray close to our base. But our guys reported that the previous night some giant beast tore apart the whole team that manned the lookout tower to the north west. Four well-armed people just smeared all over the perimeter. Those weren't dogs for sure. I know you're a tough guy, so maybe you could visit the place and get rid of that nasty fucker?
Hey, great job, man! I hope this reward's good enough for you. That and the stories people'll tell.
Defend the pump station

One of our patrols captured some bandits fucking around the pump station, after a good beating they confessed they're preparing an assault. We don't know when they'll hit, I already sent some guys over there but any help is welcome... and rewarded of course.
Unnatural Selection
Collect %s samples for Professor Kalancha.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well. Collect %s samples.
The samples are in good condition. Very well, I will get to research immediately. Thank you.
Scientific Progress
Find one "%s" artefact for Professor Kalancha.
Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me?

Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me? Find one "%s" artefact.
Even after all these years they never cease to amaze me. What a wonderful specimen. Thank you for your assistance.
Scarce Supplies
Professor Kalancha requires %s

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock.

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock. Procure some %s, please.
We are all deeply indebted for your help.
Find %s for Professor Kalancha
%s is required by Professor Kalancha to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I own you big time.
Deliver PDA to Nimble
Spore needs you to deliver an encrypted PDA to Nimble in Zaton.

Okay, hotshot. Need a job? This PDA needs delivered to a dude who hangs out in Zaton; his name is Nimble. He will compensate you on delivery. Don't drop it in a puddle or some dumb shit like that... or I'll have your ass. While you're there, check out what he has to offer; he can get his hands on some nice equipment... for a price.
Destroy the helicopter
Spore is fed up and wants you to destroy the helicopter. He will offer you a discount if you follow through.

That damn chopper is driving me nuts. I have bad tinnitus, and every time that fucking thing is patrolling the southern border, it makes my ears scream! Makes me want to bludgeon a baby flesh! Down the fucking thing and I'll give you a discount, please, before I get somebody killed.
Escort the Ecologists
Clear Sky scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp; where you will be compensated.

Scientists here in camp need an experienced stalker to lead them out into the field for study. Are you up for it? Your job is to keep them alive and guide them to their destination. Failure will give you a bad reputation around here.
Thank you, stalker. You may have this as payment for your services.
Clear area of mutants

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Librarian after the job is done.
Are you an avid hunter? We've been looking for someone to keep the marshes a bit safer by clearing out mutants in areas that our faction frequents. Would you like the job?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
Assault the bandit camp
You have been tasked to eliminate the bandit threat within the area. Report back to Librarian after the job is done.

We have a big problem with bandits in the area. Those murderous thugs have been ambushing our camps outside the main base, trying to take the territory over. It'll deny us passage through many safe routes through the marshes as long as they're in the area. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. Will you help us out?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
Procure %s
Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Librarian in the Clear Sky base camp.
If you are good with a rifle and not afraid of a few mutants, then I have a job for you. Are you interested?

Rations are running low, and I need to keep everyone in camp's bellies full. Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately... So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. I kill and process the meat, right here in my kitchen. Keep in mind that getting the mutants all riled up makes the meat tough because of the adrenaline. Also, the lesser the bleeding, the better the meat tastes. So, just be careful with your shots, okay?
Great, you are a good hunter after all! I have payment for you.
Find %s for Novikov
%s are required by Novikov to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.

It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. I would be able to perform upgrades on a greater variety of equipment if I can just get my hands on some new tools. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! Here, let me throw some money at you.
Find %s for Novikov
%s are required by Novikov to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I could really use more tools. You brought me some good shit last time but I need a higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! You came through for me once again! Here, let me throw some money at you.
Find %s for Novikov
%s are required by Novikov to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I could really use more tools. You brought me some good shit last time but I need a higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Awesome, man! You came through for me once again! Here, let me throw some money at you.
You are our guide? I will mark the location on your PDA. Lead the way, and we will follow. After we complete our analysis escort us back safely. Speak to me again when we return to camp.
Yes? We should get moving. The longer we wait around, the more dangerous it gets.
Thank you, stalker. You did your job well. Here is your payment.
Okay.
Mysteries of the Zone
You came to the Zone seeking to unravel its many mysteries. A familiar face may hold the answers that you seek.
The Hotel Polissya
The key and coordinates the doctor gave you indicates that Strelok has hidden a stash in a room at the Hotel Polissya in Pripyat.
You have found the hotel at the coordinates you were given. Around here somewhere should be the room matching the inscription on the key.
A few scattered items are littered about the room left abandoned by Strelok. They should be investigated for potential clues.
Investigate the Agroprom underground
Investigate the Agroprom underground and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X18
Investigate laboratory X18 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X16
Investigate laboratory X16 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X19
Investigate laboratory X19 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X8
Investigate laboratory X8 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate the Jupiter underground
Investigate the Jupiter underground and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate the Chernobyl NPP
Investigate the Chernobyl NPP and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
